column.name: EClipboardSheetDefNum
column.summary: Primary key.

column.name: SheetDefNum
column.summary: FK to SheetDef.SheetDefNum.

column.name: ClinicNum
column.summary: FK to clinic.ClinicNum. 0 if no clinic or if default clinic.

column.name: ResubmitInterval
column.summary: Indicates the acceptable amount of time that can pass since the last time the patient has filled this sheet out. Once this has elapsed, if the EClipboardCreateMissingFormsOnCheckIn pref is turned on, this sheet will automatically be added to the patient sheets to fill out when the patient is checked-in.

column.name: ItemOrder
column.summary: The order in which the patient will be asked to fill out this sheet.

column.name: LoginAttemptNum
column.summary: Primary key.

column.name: UserName
column.summary: The username that was attempted. May not be a username that exists.

column.name: LoginType
column.summary: Enum:UserWebFKeyType The part of the program where an attempt was made. If we want to use this for other parts of the program that are do not use the userweb table, we can change this enum to a different one.

Enumeration.name: UserWebFKeyType
Enumeration.summary: The type of row that identifies which table FKey links to.
Enumeration.EnumValue: This is a default value that should never be saved into the table.

column.name: DateTFail
column.summary: When the failed attempt was attempted.

column.name: PatNum
column.summary: FK to patient.PatNum. Indicates which patient is currently using the device. 0 indicates the device is not in use. -1 indicates that the device is in use but we do not yet know which patient is using the device.

column.name: LastCheckInActivity
column.summary: The date and time when we last updated the PatNum field for this device (indication the current use-state of the device).

column.name: ScheduledProcessNum
column.summary: Primary Key

column.name: ScheduledAction
column.summary: Enum:ScheduledActionEnum

Enumeration.name: ScheduledActionEnum
Enumeration.summary: Action to be selected by user when scheduling. When adding a new value to this Enum add a case for it in the ScheduledProcessThread in OpendentalService and a method to handle the action.

column.name: TimeToRun
column.summary: What time of the day it's supposed to run.

column.name: FrequencyToRun
column.summary: Enum:FrequencyToRunEnum

Enumeration.name: FrequencyToRunEnum
Enumeration.summary: Frequency with which an action will be run. When adding a new value to this Enum add a case for it in the ScheduledProcessThread in OpendentalService with the logic to check if the action should be run.

column.name: LastRanDateTime
column.summary: Date and time when process last ran.

column.name: TaxTransID
column.summary: (Deprecated) Holds the Avalara transaction ID associated with this adjustment so that we can track reported adjustments. Not editable in the UI.

column.name: ItemValue
column.summary: Like description, but more specific. When set use ActionType.ShowItemValue to show this variable within a MsgBoxCopyPaste window.

column.name: UserNum
column.summary: FK to Userod.UserNum. Will only be shown to that specific user. 0 is all users.

column.name: AlertCategoryNum
column.summary: FK to alertcategory.AlertCategoryNum.

column.name: Priority
column.summary: Indicates if the appointment has any special priority.

column.name: DoNotSendWithin
column.summary: The time before the appointment in which this reminder should NOT be sent. E.g., if this value is 2 days, and an appt is created one day in the future, a reminder will not be sent.

column.name: PatStatus
column.summary: Enum:PatientStatus - used to determine which status to change to for ChangePatientStatus automation actions. Should never be 'Deleted'

column.name: CarrierGroupName
column.summary: FK to definition.DefNum. Links carriers into groups for queries.

column.name: ApptTextBackColor
column.summary: Color that the carrier is highlighted within the appointment module appointment and popup bubble.

column.name: IsCoinsuranceInverted
column.summary: False by default. Determines if the carrier supplied EB08 field of 271 transactions should be inverted for coinsurance percentages. When true carriers sent us insurance percentage so we do not need to invert it, it is already inverted for us.

column.name: Width
column.summary: The width of the claim form.

column.name: Height
column.summary: The height of the claim form.

column.name: TrackingErrorDefNum
column.summary: FK to definition.DefNum for custom tracking errors when TrackingType=StatusHistory

column.name: IsClaimExportAllowed
column.summary: True by default. This flag is implemented individually within each clearinghouse. Can be overridden by clinic-level clearinghouses.

column.name: IsAttachmentSendAllowed
column.summary: Currently only used for DentalXChange's attachment service. This indicates that the user has set up the attachment service and would like to use it in Open Dental.

column.name: SchedNote
column.summary: Indicates if the clinic should only be scheduled in a certain way (e.g. ortho only, etc)

column.name: HasProcOnRx
column.summary: Defaults to false. If true, will require procedure be attached to controlled prescriptions written from this clinic.

column.name: AptDateTimeOrig
column.summary: The datetime of the appointment when this ConfirmationRequest was created.

column.name: TSPrior
column.summary: The TSPrior of the rule that was used to create this ConfirmationRequest.

column.name: DoNotResend
column.summary: Indicates whether the user has chosen to not resend the confirmation request when the AptDateTime has changed.

column.name: SmsSentOk
column.summary: Generated by HQ. Indicates whether or not we were able to send the text message.

column.name: EmailSentOk
column.summary: Generated by HQ. Indicates whether or not we were able to send the e-mail.

column.name: ExcludeProcSync
column.summary: Only used at OD HQ. Excludes credit card from syncing default procedures. False by default.

column.name: PaySimpleToken
column.summary: Token for PaySimple. PaySimple returns a token, when requested by the merchant's system, to be used instead of actual credit card number in subsequent transactions.

column.name: ChargeFrequency
column.summary: Stores how often the credit card gets charged for a recurring charge. The card can either be charged fixed days of the month or fixed week days of the month. Some examples of the former are "4th day of the month" or "1st and 16th day of the month". Some examples of the latter are "Third Monday of the month" or "Every other Friday of the month". If the first character of this column is a 0, then the frequency is fixed day of the month. If the first character is 1, the frequency is fixed week days of the month. The next character is a pipe for separation. If fixed day of the month, the remaining characters will be a comma-separated list of days of the month. If fixed week days, the next character will represent type of frequency (Every, EveryOther, First, etc.). Then a pipe follows. The last character will be the day of the week (0 for Sunday, 1 for Monday, etc.).

column.name: Batch
column.summary: Holds the batch number for the deposit. Does not have a default value. 25 character limit.

column.name: DepositAccountNum
column.summary: FK to Def.DefNum. Links this deposit to a definition of type AutoDeposit. When set to a valid value, it indicates that this deposit is an "auto deposit".

column.name: IsHidden
column.summary: Set true to hide in Discount Plan list.

column.name: IsVisibleInSubMenu
column.summary: When true and IsHidden is false, will show this report in a pop out sub menu.

column.name: ClinicNum
column.summary: FK to clinic.ClinicNum.

column.name: IsSuperFamily
column.summary: Boolean. Is true when the message is specifically created for super families.

column.name: AptNum
column.summary: FK to appointment.AptNum. Used to a attach an email to an appointment for eReminders and eConfirmations.

column.name: UserNum
column.summary: FK to userod.UserNum. Optional. 0 if unknown (ex recieved emails).

column.name: UserNum
column.summary: FK to Userod.UserNum. The user that created the erx.

column.name: UserNum
column.summary: FK to userod.UserNum

column.name: FKey
column.summary: Generic foreign key to any other table. Typically used in combination with PermType to give permission to specific things.

column.name: GroupType
column.summary: FK to definition.DefNum. Reporting Group.

column.name: BillingType
column.summary: FK to definition.DefNum.

column.name: HasPpoSubstWriteoffs
column.summary: True by default. When a plan allows downgrading procedures and this field is false, the writeoff will be $0 and the difference between the proc fee and the insurance estimate will be the patient portion.

column.name: ExclusionFeeRule
column.summary: The exclusion rule for this insurance plan. PracticeDefault by default. It determines how insurance plans should behave with Exclusions.

column.name: DateTimeEntry
column.summary: DateTime the row was added.

column.name: HoursAvailableForVerification
column.summary: Number of hours that were available from the time the insurance needed verified to the date of the appointment. Includes minutes if applicable.

column.name: VerifyUserNum
column.summary: FK to userod.UserNum. User that was logged on when row was inserted.

column.name: SecUserNumEntry
column.summary: FK to userod.UserNum. The user who created this journal entry.

column.name: SecDateTEntry
column.summary: The date and time that this journal entry was created.

column.name: SecUserNumEdit
column.summary: FK to userod.UserNum. The user who last edited this journal entry.

column.name: SecDateTEdit
column.summary: The last time this journal entry was edited.

column.name: DateTStamp
column.summary: Automatically updated whenever a row is added or changed. Not user editable.

column.name: ImageFolder
column.summary: FK to definition.DefNum. This determines the default Image Category that will be selected when printing or previewing the letter. Can be 0 which means 'None' will be selected.

column.name: ErxGuid
column.summary: Uniquely identifies the prescription corresponding to the medical order. Allows us to update existing eRx medical orders when refreshing prescriptions in the Chart (similar to how prescriptions are updated). Also used in 2-way medication synching with eRx.

column.name: UserNum
column.summary: FK to userod.UserNum. The user that created or last edited an ortho chart field.

column.name: PlanCategory
column.summary: FK to definition.DefNum

column.name: SecDateTEntry
column.summary: DateTime payplancharge was added to the payplan. Not editable by user.

column.name: SecDateTEdit
column.summary: DateTime payplancharge was edited. Not editable by user.

column.name: StatementNum
column.summary: FK to statement.StatementNum. Only used when the statement in an invoice.

column.name: FSplitNum
column.summary: FK to paysplit.SplitNum. Can be 0. Indicates that this paysplit is meant to counteract another Paysplit.

column.name: AdjNum
column.summary: FK to adjustment.AdjNum. Can be 0. Indicates that this paysplit is meant to counteract an Adjustment.

column.name: IsMultiVisit
column.summary: Only useful for procedure buttons which cause more than one procedure to be charted. Example: Crown (D code) and Delivery (N code). Causes the procedures generated by this procedure button to be grouped using links in the procmultivisit table.

column.name: ProcStatus
column.summary: Enum:ProcStat Indicates which status the procedure has to be set to in order for this note to take affect. Should only ever be 1 (TP) or 2 (C). See procedurelog.ProcStatus for more info.

Enumeration.name: ProcStat
Enumeration.summary: Procedure Status. These statuses are transalted via class type "enumProcStat" (ex Lan.g("enumProcStat","..."))

column.name: DefaultTPNote
column.summary: The default procedure note used when creating a new treatment planned procedure.

column.name: BypassGlobalLock
column.summary: Enum:BypassLockStatus Specifies whether a proceduce with this code can be created before the global lock date. The only values that should be used for this field are NeverBypass and BypassIfZero.

Enumeration.name: BypassLockStatus
Enumeration.summary: The conditions when the global lock date can be bypassed.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 1 - Bypass the lock date if the fee is zero.
2 - Always bypass the global lock date.

column.name: TaxCode
column.summary: Used for Sales Tax, this is the corresponding tax code we will send to Avalara API so they can determine how much sales tax to charge for this procedure.

column.name: TaxAmt
column.summary: Holds the Sales Tax estimate for this procedure. Becomes a finalized amount when the procedure is marked complete.

column.name: FeeAllowed
column.summary: The amount primary insurance allows. Should be the exact amount in the FormClaimProc allowed amount field. May be either the PPO fee or the out of network allowed fee.

column.name: TaxAmt
column.summary: Holds the Sales Tax estimate for this procedure. Used to review history when being reviewed by accounting. In the Treatment Plan, this represents an estimate and a record for pre-payments.

column.name: Birthdate
column.summary: The birthdate of the provider.

column.name: SchedNote
column.summary: Indicates if the provider should only be scheduled in a certain way (e.g. Root canals only)

column.name: WebSchedDescript
column.summary: The description of the provider that is displayed to patients in Web Sched.

column.name: WebSchedImageLocation
column.summary: The image of the provider that is displayed to patients in Web Sched. File name only (path not included). This should be a file name in the A to Z folder.

column.name: HourlyProdGoalAmt
column.summary: The hourly production goal amount of the provider.

column.name: DateTerm
column.summary: The date that the provider's term ends. This can be used to prevent appointments from being scheduled, appointments from being marked complete, prescriptions from being prescribed, and claims from being sent.

column.name: IsEpcs
column.summary: Set to true manually if the customer has completed their EPCS process.

column.name: ErxType
column.summary: Enum:ErxOption Identifies which eRx option is being used when asking HQ if they are enabled.

Enumeration.name: ErxOption
Enumeration.summary: This Enumeration should match the enumeration in WebServiceCustomerUpdates.ProviderErx. Any changes made to this enum need to also be changed there.

column.name: UserId
column.summary: User identifier used by the associated ErxType. Only used by OD HQ.

column.name: AccountId
column.summary: Only used by OD HQ.

column.name: RegistrationKeyNum
column.summary: FK to registrationkey.RegistrationKeyNum. HQ only, links to the registration key used to make this providererx row.

column.name: Priority
column.summary: Indicates if the appointment has any special priority.

column.name: DateTStamp
column.summary: The datetime this referral attachment was last edited.

column.name: DateTStamp
column.summary: The datetime this referral was last edited.

column.name: IsPreferred
column.summary: True if the referral is a preferred referral.

column.name: HasEarlyAccess
column.summary: This is a customer that is allowed early access to certain features. E.g. downloading the Alpha version of the software.

column.name: Npi
column.summary: Stores the NPI of the provider on this repeating charge for Erx. This used to be stored in the Note field but got moved over to its own column in 17.2.

column.name: ErxAccountId
column.summary: Stores the Erx Account ID on this repeating charge for Erx. This used to be stored in the Note field but got moved over to its own column in 17.2.

column.name: ProviderName
column.summary: Stores the name of the provider on this repeating charge for Erx. Value is received directly from NewCrop.

column.name: ChargeAmtAlt
column.summary: HQ Only. An alternate amount to be charged for this RepeatCharge in some cases. Should always defaul to -1 as -1 will be used as a flag to indicate it has not been set. A value of 0 means ChargeAmtAlt has been intentionally set to 0.

column.name: UnearnedTypes
column.summary: If UsePrepay is true, when the procedure is created from this repeat charge, it will allocate payments from these unearned types. Stored as a comma separated list of DefNums of Category PaySplitUnearnedType. If empty, then all unearned types will be considered.

column.name: IsProcRequired
column.summary: If true will require procedure be attached to this prescription when printed. Usually true if IsControlled is true.

column.name: PatientInstruction
column.summary: Directions intended for the patient.

column.name: ErxGuid
column.summary: eRx returns this unique identifier to use for electronic Rx. Also set for Open Dental created medications using a different format.

column.name: ErxPharmacyInfo
column.summary: The pharmacyinfo field contains the pharmacy name as well as other information about the pharmacy, but the information is inconsistent. The purpose of this field is to give the user means to visually verify they have the correct pharmacy selected.

column.name: IsProcRequired
column.summary: If true will require procedure be attached to this prescription when printed. Usually true if IsControlled is true.

column.name: ProcNum
column.summary: The procedure attached to this prescription when IsProcRequired is true.

column.name: DaysOfSupply
column.summary: The number of days this prescription is intended to last. Only used when IsProcRequired is true.

column.name: PatientInstruction
column.summary: Directions intended for the patient.

column.name: ClinicNum
column.summary: FK to clinic.ClinicNum.

column.name: DateTPrevious
column.summary: Used to store the previous DateTStamp or SecDateTEdit of the object FKey refers to.

column.name: SheetDefNum
column.summary: FK to sheetdef.SheetDefNum. The SheetDef that was used to create this sheet. Will be 0 if this sheet was created from a Web Form or an internal sheet or if the sheet was created before 17.2. Currently only used to determine the sheet can bypass the global lock date.

column.name: DocNum
column.summary: FK to document.DocNum. Referrel letters are stored as PDF in the A to Z folder.

column.name: ClinicNum
column.summary: FK to clinic.ClinicNum. Used by webforms to limit the sheets displayed based on the currently selected clinic.

column.name: DateTSheetEdited
column.summary: The date and time the sheet was inserted or last time someone opened the sheet and clicked OK on FormSheetFillEdit. Gets updated even if no changes were made to the sheet or sheetfields, because we don't want to do the lengthy work of comparing all fields. Used when editing a sheet to warn user if the sheet has been edited by someone else.

column.name: HasMobileLayout
column.summary: If true then this Sheet has been designed for mobile and will be displayed as a mobile-friendly WebForm.

column.name: BypassGlobalLock
column.summary: Enum:BypassLockStatus Specifies whether a sheet can be created before the global lock date.

Enumeration.name: BypassLockStatus
Enumeration.summary: The conditions when the global lock date can be bypassed.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 1 - Bypass the lock date if the fee is zero.
2 - Always bypass the global lock date.

column.name: HasMobileLayout
column.summary: If true then this Sheet has been designed for mobile and will be displayed as a mobile-friendly WebForm.

column.name: IsLocked
column.summary: If a sheet field is locked, it stops a user from editing the text when presented in a sheet.

column.name: TabOrderMobile
column.summary: Tab stop order for all fields of a mobile sheet. One-based. Only mobile fields can have values other than 0. If all SheetFieldDefs for a given SheetField are 0 then assume that this sheet has no mobile-specific view.

column.name: UiLabelMobile
column.summary: Each input field for a mobile will need a corresponding UI label. This is what the user sees as the label describing what this input is for. EG "First Name:, Last Name:, Address, etc."

column.name: UiLabelMobileRadioButton
column.summary: Human readable label that will be displayed for radio button item in mobile mode. Cannot use UiLabelMobile for this purpose as it is already dedicated to the radio group header that groups radio button items together.

column.name: IsLocked
column.summary: If a sheet field is locked, it stops a user from editing the text when presented in a sheet.

column.name: TabOrderMobile
column.summary: Tab stop order for all fields of a mobile sheet. One-based. Only mobile fields can have values other than 0. If all SheetFieldDefs for a given SheetField are 0 then assume that this sheet has no mobile-specific view.

column.name: UiLabelMobile
column.summary: Each input field for a mobile will need a corresponding UI label. This is what the user sees as the label describing what this input is for. EG "First Name:, Last Name:, Address, etc."

column.name: UiLabelMobileRadioButton
column.summary: Human readable label that will be displayed for radio button or checkbox item in mobile mode. Cannot use UiLabelMobile for this purpose as it is already dedicated to the radio group header that groups radio button items together.

column.name: LayoutMode
column.summary: Used when there are multiple modes for associated sheetDef, like chart module modes (base,treatment plan,ecw,orion,...). SheetFieldLayoutMode.Default for all sheetdefs that do not have multiple modes.

column.name: RemoteRole
column.summary: Enum:RemotingRole The RemotingRole of the instance that created this signal.

Enumeration.name: RemotingRole
Enumeration.EnumValue: This dll is on a local workstation, and this workstation has successfully connected directly to the database with no 'server' layer.
Workstation that is getting its data from a web service on the server.
This dll is part of a web server that is providing data via web services.

column.name: MsgValue
column.summary: Message value of the signal.

column.name: MsgDiscountUSD
column.summary: Any discount applied to this message. If a particular messages has a MsgDiscountUSD > 0 then the MsgChargeUSD will reflect the charge to the customer after the discount has already been applied. Multi-part messages will still be charged the wholesale rate for all parts after the first part. To calculate the typical charge that this customer would pay without the discount use MsgChargeUSD + MsgDiscountUSD. To calculate the percentage discounted off standard charges use (MsgDiscountUSD / (MsgChargeUSD + MsgDiscountUSD)).

column.name: ShortGUID
column.summary: A short alphanumeric string used to uniquely identify this statement.

column.name: StatementShortURL
column.summary: A short URL that can be visited to view this statement. Useful to include in text messages.

column.name: StatementURL
column.summary: A URL that can be visited to view this statement.

column.name: SmsSendStatus
column.summary: Stores what should be done or was done in regards to SMS messaging for this statement.

column.name: UserNum
column.summary: FK to userod.UserNum. User that placed the order, is editable.

column.name: ShippingCharge
column.summary: The order's shipping charge.

column.name: DateTimeOriginal
column.summary: The original datetime that the row was inserted. Used to sort the list by the order entered. Using taskhist.DateTimeOriginal will get the datetime that the task row was inserted, not the taskhist.

column.name: GlobalTaskFilterType
column.summary: Enum:GlobalTaskFilterType 0=Disabled, 1=Default, 2=None, 3=Clinic, 4=Region. If a type is selected, then tasks in this tasklist will be filtered by default such that only tasks that match the tasklist's GlobalFilterType will show in the view.

Enumeration.name: GlobalTaskFilterType
Enumeration.summary: Used to determine which tasks should be filtered to show in a tasklist.

column.name: TaskNum
column.summary: FK to task.TaskNum. When this is not 0 then TaskListNum will be 0.

column.name: IsOvertimeExempt
column.summary: Indicates if the employee should have overtime calculated for their hours worked in a pay period.

column.name: MinClockInTime
column.summary: When set this is the earliest an employee can clock in. Otherwise minimum dateTime represents not set.

column.name: SecUserNumEdit
column.summary: FK to userod.UserNum. The user who last edited this transaction.

column.name: SecDateTEdit
column.summary: The last time this transaction was edited.

column.name: TPType
column.summary: Enum:TreatPlanType Determines the type of insurance this treatment plan was saved with. Used for displaying proper information when loading.

Enumeration.name: TreatPlanType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 0 - Treatment plan saved for regular insurance.
1 - Treatment plan saved for discount plan.

column.name: SignaturePractice
column.summary: The encrypted and bound signature in base64 format. The signature is bound to the concatenation of the tp Note, DateTP, and to each proctp Descript and PatAmt.

column.name: DateTSigned
column.summary: The date of the treatment plan is signed.

column.name: DateTPracticeSigned
column.summary: The date of the treatment plan is signed by the office.

column.name: SignatureText
column.summary: The typed name of the person who signed the treatplan.

column.name: SignaturePracticeText
column.summary: The typed name of the person who signed the practice signature.

column.name: DomainUser
column.summary: The username for the ActiveDirectory user to link the account to.

column.name: IsPasswordResetRequired
column.summary: Boolean. If true, the user's password needs to be reset on next login.

column.name: ClinicNum
column.summary: FK to Clinic.ClinicNum.

column.name: IsReleased
column.summary: Determines whether the query is safe for users with lower permissions. Also causes this user query to show as a sub menu to the User Query menu item within the Reports main menu.

column.name: IsPromptSetup
column.summary: Determines whether the Query Favorites window should prompt for query values via FormQueryParser/'SET Fields' popup when running query.

column.name: RequirePasswordChange
column.summary: Set to true to require a user to change their Password.

column.name: PickList
column.summary: Newline delimited list of options for the user to select from when adding or editing a wiki list item.

column.name: IsLocked
column.summary: Records if a wiki page is locked. If it is locked, only user swith the WikiAdmin permission are allowed to edit the page

column.name: IsDeleted
column.summary: This flag will be set when the user archives the WikiPage.

column.name: PageContentPlainText
column.summary: Content of page stored without any HTML markup or wiki page links. This plain text allows for easier searching.
